Description: Two joined pieces of the side of a bowl of grey marble: with an incised inscription in two columns on the exterior surface. Good condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, pl. VIII, 14; F. Legge, ‘Proceedings of the Society of Biblical Archaeology’ 30 (London, 1908), pl.VIb; V. Vikentiev, 'Annales du Service des Antiquitiés de l'Égypte' 48 (1948), 672, fig. 4, (3).
